participant_1.background:
I spend my time bird watching with my cats.
The holidays make me depressed.
I am an animal activist.
I have rainbow hair.
My age is too old to say.

participant_2.background:
I graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance.
My parents are very wealthy bankers.
I grew up in manhattan.
I plan to go to business school next year.
I drive a bmw.

content.text: I'm so glad I found someone who likes bird watching! I love watching the birds in my backyard, and I'm always learning new things about them.
Oh, that's so cool! I've always wanted to learn more about birds, but I'm not sure where to start.
You could always start by reading about them online or checking out some books from the library. There are also a lot of great birdwatching apps that can help you identify different species.
That's a great idea! I'll definitely check it out.
I'm also an animal activist, so I'm always looking for ways to help animals. I've been volunteering at my local animal shelter for a few years now, and it's really rewarding work.
That's awesome! I love that you're so passionate about helping animals. I've always wanted to volunteer at an animal shelter, but I've never had the time.
You should definitely look into it! It's a great way to give back to the community and help animals in need.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel, and I've been to a lot of different countries. I also like to go to concerts, and I'm a big fan of the New York Yankees.
Oh, that's so cool! I've always wanted to travel the world, but I haven't had the chance yet. I love going to concerts too, and my favorite band is The Killers.
The Killers are great! I've seen them live a few times, and they always put on a great show.
Me too! I'm so glad we have so much in common.
Me too! This is the best conversation I've had in a long time.
